snippet: A battle is brewing over a professional football team in Southern California even though the league has not signaled any interest in playing there.
abstract: Mere prospect of bringing National Football League team to Los Angeles has set off dispute in nearby Pasadena after city offers use of its Rose Bowl stadium as temporary home for team; proposal sets off storm of protest among Pasadena residents, who say additional football events would disrupt neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: A battle is brewing over a professional football team in Southern California even though the league has not signaled any interest in playing there.

headline.seo: Rose Bowl Neighbors Protest an N.F.L. Proposal
headline.main: An N.F.L. Team at the Rose Bowl? Not if Some Neighbors Have Their Way
headline.print_headline: An N.F.L. Team at the Rose Bowl? Not if Some Neighbors Have Their Way
